anl.verdi.plot.types

Class AxisNumberFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • java.text.NumberFormat
        • anl.verdi.plot.types.AxisNumberFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AxisNumberFormatter
extends java.text.NumberFormat
    Offsets the axis labels by 1, so that the origin appears to be 1,1.
    Author:
    Nick Collier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
